content: Access Service Provider metadata to add {{organizationName}} {{productName}} as a trusted Service Provider in your IdP account.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the "Add Trusted Service Provider" button subtitle. It provides a brief explanation of what information will be added to the IdP account when selecting an organization as a trusted service provider. The translated text appears in a dialog box related to Single Sign On (SSO) settings on mobile devices.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "كمقدم خدمة موثوق به" (as a trusted service provider) is a literal translation and could be phrased more naturally in Arabic. A more idiomatic expression might be "كمزود خدمة موثوق به" or "كشريك موثوق به في الخدمة".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بالوصول إلى البيانات التعريفية لموفر الخدمة لإضافة {{organizationName}} {{productName}} كمزود خدمة موثوق به في حساب IdP الخاص بك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Xidmət Provayderi' repeated twice within the sentence is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP hesabınıza etibarlı xidmət provayderi kimi {{organizationName}} {{productName}} əlavə etmək üçün xidmət metadatasına daxil olun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "доверен доставчик на услуги" (trusted service provider) is technically correct but slightly formal and could be improved for better readability in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing might be 'доверен партньор' (trusted partner).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Достъп до метаданните на доставчика на услуги, за да добавите {{organizationName}} {{productName}} като доверен партньор във вашия акаунт за IdP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Access Service Provider metadata' is translated as 'Získejte přístup k metadatům poskytovatele služeb'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural translation might be 'Získejte metadata poskytovatele služeb' or 'Stáhněte si metadata poskytovatele služeb'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Získejte metadata poskytovatele služeb

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Access Service Provider metadata" is translated as "Αποκτήστε πρόσβαση στα μεταδεδομένα παρόχου υπηρεσιών". While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation might be "Λάβετε τα μεταδεδομένα παρόχου υπηρεσιών" or "Κατεβάστε τα μεταδεδομένα παρόχου υπηρεσιών".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Λάβετε τα μεταδεδομένα παρόχου υπηρεσιών

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content uses double curly braces `{{...}}` for placeholders. The Greek translation also maintains the double curly braces, which is standard but might be worth noting for consistency with other translated content or documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but ensure consistency with other documentation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon (:) after 'Մատակարար' which seems unusual in this context. Colons are often used to introduce explanations or lists, but here it doesn't quite fit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after 'Մատակարար'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'որպես վստահելի Ծառայությունների Մատակարար ավելացնելու համար' is a bit literal and could be phrased more naturally. 'ավելացնելու համար' translates to 'to add' but sounds clunky. The overall flow could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the end of the sentence to something like: 'ձեր IdP հաշվում {{organizationName}} {{productName}}-ը վստահելի ծառայությունների մատակարար տեղակալելու համար:' (to register/assign as a trusted service provider).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ' (Service Provider) is repeated unnecessarily. While grammatically correct, it sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຂົ້າເຖິງ metadata ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການເພື່ອເພີ່ມ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ເປັນຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ໃນບັນຊີ IdP ຂອງທ່ານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ga naar de Service Provider metadata' is too literal. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Open de Service Provider metadata' or 'Bekijk de Service Provider metadata'. 'Ga naar' implies navigation, which might not be the intended action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Open de Service Provider metadata

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Access Service Provider metadata' is too literal. A more natural Portuguese translation might be 'Obtenha os metadados do provedor de serviços' or 'Recupere os metadados do provedor de serviços'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obtenha os metadados do provedor de serviços

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'trusted' is translated as 'confiável'. While technically correct, 'confiável' can sound formal in this context. A more conversational alternative might be 'de confiança'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: de confiança

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Access Service Provider metadata' is too literal. A more natural translation would be 'Obtenha os metadados do provedor de serviços' or 'Recupere os metadados do provedor de serviços'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obtenha os metadados do provedor de serviços

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'trusted Service Provider' could be more accurately translated as 'provedor de serviços confiável'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: provedor de serviços confiável

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'furnizorului de identitate (IdP)' could be improved for readability. While technically correct, the parentheses can be disruptive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Accesați metadatele ale furnizorului de servicii pentru a adăuga {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ca un furnizor de servicii de încredere în contul dvs. IdP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'IdP account' is translated as 'аккаунт поставщика учетных записей'. While technically correct, a more natural and common translation for 'IdP account' in this context would be 'аккаунт удостоверяющего органа' or 'аккаунт IdP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Получите доступ к метаданным поставщика сервиса, чтобы добавить {{organizationName}} {{productName}} в качестве надежного поставщика сервиса в ваш аккаунт удостоверяющего органа (IdP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation includes placeholders {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} just like the English version, but it's not clear if these should remain in the Sinhala version, or be replaced with actual values. This needs clarification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Confirm whether {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} should remain as placeholders or be replaced with the actual organization and product names in the Sinhala translation. If placeholders are needed, ensure they are handled correctly in the system displaying the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Access Service Provider metadata' could be translated more accurately to convey the meaning of accessing the metadata specifically to add as a Service Provider. 'Service Provider metadata වෙත පිවිසීම' is a literal translation but could be improved for clarity and natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Access Service Provider metadata' as 'సేවා සැපයුම්කරු మెటాడేటా ලබා ගැනීම' (Sevaa sappayumkaru metadaataa laba getuva) for a more natural and precise meaning, depending on context. Another option is 'సేవా සැපයුම්කරු మెటాడేటా mengakses කිරීම' (Sevaa sappayumkaru metadaataa apeksha karama). Consult with a Sinhala language expert for the best option.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Service Provider' is translated as 'poskytovateľa služieb', which is technically correct but can be clunky in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would be 'poskytovateľa' or 'služieb'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prejdite k metadátam poskytovateľa a pridajte {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ako dôveryhodného poskytovateľa do svojho účtu IdP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'do svojho účtu IdP' is grammatically correct but a bit abrupt. Adding a connector like 'v' could improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prejdite k metadátam poskytovateľa a pridajte {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ako dôveryhodného poskytovateľa do v svojom účte IdP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Приступ" (Accessed) doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of "Access" in the English context. It suggests gaining access to, rather than providing access to metadata *for* adding a service provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добијте метаподатке пружаоца услуга како бисте додали...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'поузданог' (trusted) seems slightly awkward. While technically correct, it sounds less natural than other options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: овлашћеног пружаоца услуга

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pružatelja' is less common and more formal than necessary. 'Pružatelja' translates to 'provider', but a simpler, more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pristup metapodacima pružaoca usluga kako biste dodali {{organizationName}} {{productName}} kao pouzdanog partnera u vašem IdP nalogu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'pouzdanog' is technically correct for 'trusted', 'partnera' (partner) might be a slightly better fit in this context, emphasizing collaboration rather than just trust.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pristup metapodacima pružaoca usluga kako biste dodali {{organizationName}} {{productName}} kao pouzdanog partnera u vašem IdP nalogu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation retains the double curly braces `{{organizationName}} {{productName}}`. This is likely unintended and should be removed, as these are placeholders for dynamic values in the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the double curly braces: '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}' and replace with the actual organization and product names as appropriate in the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Servis Sağlayıcı' is a very literal translation of 'Service Provider'. A more natural phrasing for Turkish users might be 'Hizmet Sağlayıcı' or potentially a more colloquial term depending on the audience. 'Servis' is often associated with 'service' in the English sense.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'Servis Sağlayıcı' with 'Hizmet Sağlayıcı' or explore more colloquial options suitable for the intended audience.  Further context would help determine the best fit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "надійного постачальника послуг" (reliable service provider) is a bit formal and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'trusted Service Provider' in this context. It implies reliability rather than trust.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отримайте доступ до метаданих постачальника послуг, щоб додати {{organizationName}} {{productName}} як перевіреного постачальника послуг у вашому обліковому записі постачальника посвідчень.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'обліковому записі постачальника посвідчень' (account of the identity provider) is accurate but quite long and technical. A more accessible term could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отримайте доступ до метаданих постачальника послуг, щоб додати {{organizationName}} {{productName}} як перевіреного постачальника послуг у вашому обліковому записі IdP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '访问服务提供商元数据以将 {{organizationName}}{{productName}}添加为您的 IdP 帐户中的受信任服务提供商' is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Chinese. It directly translates 'Access Service Provider metadata to add...as a trusted Service Provider'. A more natural phrasing would be something like '用于将 {{organizationName}}{{productName}} 添加为您的 IdP 账户中的信任的服务提供商' or '以便将 {{organizationName}}{{productName}} 添加为您的 IdP 账户中的受信任服务提供商'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用于将 {{organizationName}}{{productName}} 添加为您的 IdP 账户中的信任的服务提供商

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variables {{organizationName}} and {{productName}} are concatenated directly, which might be less readable. Consider adding a space between them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用于将 {{organizationName}} {{productName}} 添加为您的 IdP 账户中的信任的服务提供商
